faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions

customerQuestions.question: How can I request a maintenance service?
customerQuestions.answer: You can request maintenance service through the app or website in simple steps. Choose the required service, set the appropriate time, and a professional technician will be assigned to serve you.

customerQuestions.question: How long does it take for the technician to arrive?
customerQuestions.answer: The technician arrives within 30 minutes to 2 hours depending on your location and the type of service required. We strive to provide the fastest response possible.

customerQuestions.question: Are prices fixed?
customerQuestions.answer: Yes, we offer transparent and pre-set prices for each service. You can know the cost before confirming the order.

customerQuestions.question: Is there a warranty on the service?
customerQuestions.answer: Yes, we provide a warranty on all maintenance work. If you face any problem, we will fix it for free.

technicianQuestions.question: How can I join as a technician?
technicianQuestions.answer: You can register through the app or website. You will need to submit your documents and skills, and we will contact you to complete the registration process.

technicianQuestions.question: What specializations are required?
technicianQuestions.answer: We accept all specializations: electrical, plumbing, AC, carpentry, painting, and more. Each specialization has available job opportunities.

technicianQuestions.question: How is payment made?
technicianQuestions.answer: Your dues are transferred weekly to your bank account or e-wallet as per your choice.

technicianQuestions.question: Is registration free?
technicianQuestions.answer: Yes, registration is completely free. There are no fees to join the UberFix technician network.

maintenanceTimeline.subtitle: From request submission to completion, an easy and transparent experience

maintenanceTimeline.step1Features: Select service type,Upload problem photos,Choose suitable time
maintenanceTimeline.step2Desc: Your request is matched with the best specialist technician in your area based on service type and ratings
maintenanceTimeline.step2Features: Smart automatic selection,Review technician profile,Confirm appointment
maintenanceTimeline.step3Desc: The technician arrives on time with all necessary tools and equipment to complete the work
maintenanceTimeline.step3Features: Live technician tracking,Instant communication,Work quality guarantee
maintenanceTimeline.step4Desc: After work completion, pay securely and share your rating to help others

founder.title: From Technician to Founder and CEO of Al-Azab Company
founder.description: The story started from the field... from maintenance... from real hard work. A long journey of learning, discipline, and building trust, until Al-Azab Company was established to become one of the fastest-growing systems in the Egyptian market, providing integrated solutions for engineering, operation, and maintenance.
